name: Jean-Paul Sartre
description: French existentialist philosopher, playwright, novelist, screenwriter, political activist, biographer, and literary critic. Combined existentialism with Marxism and wrote extensively on freedom and responsibility.

name: Louis Althusser
description: French Marxist philosopher. Developed the theory of structural Marxism and made major contributions to debates on ideological state apparatuses, overdetermination, and the epistemological break in Marx's thought.
